title: Intensive Short-Term Workshop for Transformative Mobile Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Mobile device utilization skills and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Learners are social sector professionals requiring real-time interaction and mobile device use in a BYOD environment, with an emphasis on practical application through case analysis.

learning_goals: Learners can plan and evaluate mobile learning designs using the DTML-PAH Matrix Model.
Learners can design two or more mobile-based collaborative activities for solving social issues.
Learners can propose three or more digital/pedagogical scaffolding strategies to enhance learner agency.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
